TopicTitle: same crash where it crashes at setting universe state [Radeon(TM) Vega 8 Graphics Below Minimum Specs]

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.4.1 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 11 | CPU: AMD Ryzen 5 3500U with Radeon Vega Mobile Gfx | GPU: AMD Radeon(TM) Vega 8 Graphics | RAM: 20GB

 

This bug has been stopping me from simply loading a save, I have tried over a dozen other "solutions" and none had worked. since I bought the game in February, this bug has stopped me from playing the game entirely. I seriously need help with this to find a long lasting solution or for the devs to add more optimisations for devices more like mine. I try to load a save and it always manages to get to "setting universe state" before the game just closes, the unity crash handler doesn't even pop up and show an error the app just closes. This doesn't generate crash reports for some reason so i can never see the root of the problem, once again any help from the community would be appreciated, there are lots of others other than myself that experience this that would benefit from any help with getting the game running.

Your video card is under minimum specs.

I recommend trying the following:
Change your resolution to minimum
Avoid loading saves that are in Low Kerbin Orbit

the thing is those solutions just don't work i cant even get something into LKO because no matter what i do i cant even create a save and setting the resolution to the absolute minimum does absolutely nothing. is there any way at all to alert the developers of this?
